input.job_description:
Saad A. Mubarak 
BI & Digital Marketing Executive 
saadali.frt@gmail.com 
+92 323 4217884 
Lahore 
linkedin.com/in/saadmali346 
I am an experienced marketer with the 3 years of experience in the Business Development, Business Intelligence, and Digital Marketing
sectors. I very much believe in teamwork, problem-solving, leadership, and adaptability like a movie director who believes in someone's
idea and adapts that idea; works with the team on the idea; leads the team, gets directions from the team, and solves their team
problem, and complete the vision. 
EDUCATION 
MS Marketing 
National College of Business Administration
& Economics 
03/2021 - Present
, 
 
Bachelor of Commerce in Information
Technology 
University of the Punjab 
06/2017 - 10/2019
, 
 
Lahore 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
BI & Digital Marketing Executive 
tossdown Technologies Pvt. Ltd. 
12/2020 - Present
, 
 
Lahore 
I am working in the Growth Team where I look over
market research, which includes scrapping and
visualizing data of diﬀerent businesses per the niche. 
I'm working on the digital marketing end where mostly I
put my eﬀorts into Email marketing. In Email marketing,
I run automated email campaigns and drip campaigns
from Hubspot 
I am also looking over to martech automation where I
look over to top and middle of the marketing funnel. 
Business Development Executive 
Matrix Tech LLC 
11/2019 - 10/2020
, 
 
Lahore 
Matrix was a contact center that sold SEO services to the
USA market. 
I sent email marketing campaigns to their prospective
audience to drive traﬃc and generate leads. 
I used to work on keyword research of clients and also
contact leads through diﬀerent mediums and also I did
dialing over there. 
Document Processing Executive 
System Limited 
02/2019 - 11/2019
, 
 
Lahore 
I was in their Business Process Outsourcing department,
where I worked on their Land Project. 
I used to compile and complete the data as per property
type. 
I also performed a Quality Check on the Property ﬁle. 
SKILLS 
Market Research 
Business Development 
Data Visualization 
Marketing Automation 
Lead Generation 
Email Marketing 
HubSpot 
SendinBlue 
MailChimp 
Web Scrapping 
Search Engine Marketing 
Social Media Marketing 
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) 
Keyword Research 
PROJECTS 
Marketing Automation Specialist for RevvLab
 (07/2022 - Present)
 
I'm working their marketing as a consultant for setting up the
automation for their diﬀerent brands. 
Business Engagement Project for Outreach Hawks
 (04/2022 - Present)
 
I am working there as a Business Engagement Executive with
their team. I handle their Upwork account and run email
marketing campaigns for them. 
Email Marketing Project for Echlipse
 (09/2021 - 02/2022)
 
I worked there as a Marketing Executive and used to scrape data
for them as per their niche. I ran email campaigns for them,
which included marketing emails and drip campaigns. 
CERTIFICATIONS 
The Fundamentals of Digital Marketing 
Advanced Google Analytics 
Google Analytics for Beginners 
LANGUAGES 
English 
Full Professional Proﬁciency 
INTERESTS 
Movies 
Direction 
Cricket 
Tasks 
Tasks 
Tasks
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
